title: New Ranked Draft Pick
body:
Hi,

Ever since I've been using the new ranked team building system I run into errors with the league client not responding. This might happen once in every 10 or so games, but it has resulted in me having to sit out and wait for the 30 minute penalty to expire. I did a quick google search and saw nothing concerning this, so I guess I'm bringing it to rito's attention.

replies.body:
Hey Phanny,

You'll probably want to [repair your client, or force a repatch](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues). Let me know if it still happens after that.

-DTN
